name: PizzaHero: Sea of Garbage
description:
Only one button, only one direction and only one slice of pizza left.

Thats the idea behind PizzaHero. Now jump and try to avoid the toxic acid!


PizzaHero: Sea of Garbage is the first game I made and published. I made it for the gmtkjam 2019. The main idea was to reference the "when there is only one piece of pizza left" meme, but from the viewpoint of the pizza. I also wanted to introduce some twists in the genre of endless runner. It also serves as a reminder to recycle more and try to minimize waste.

If you have any critique, feel free to leave me a comment :D
